ActCanada Recovery Benefits Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Canada Recovery Benefits Act
PrecisRegulations amending the CANADA RECOVERY BENEFITS ACT in order to (1) provide income support during the COVID-19 pandemic; (2) extend the benefit window for the Canada Recovery Sickness Benefit and the Canada Recovery Caregiving Benefit to November 20, 2021; and 3) ensure that there is no gap in payment for claimants.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2021-0219 Publication Date: 2021-11-10
AttachmentsAttachment
